body_html:
@unlimblue Thanks for the fix!

We have existing tests for the distributed package in test_distributed.py. Please integrate this test in that file. No need for spawning processes since that's all taken care of there. You can look at the existing distributed data parallel tests for an example how to use them.

body:
@unlimblue Thanks for the fix!

We have existing tests for the distributed package in `test_distributed.py`. Please integrate this test in that file. No need for spawning processes since that's all taken care of there. You can look at the existing distributed data parallel tests for an example how to use them.
